name: Supernatural Vision Investigation
description: Scenario where Pope Leo XIII experiences and investigates a supernatural vision

primary_agent.description: The main character experiencing the vision

narrator.description: Describes the environment and vision details

phases.name: initial_experience
phases.description: Pope Leo XIII begins to experience the vision
phases.prompt_template: The evening prayer has ended, and Pope Leo XIII finds himself alone in his private study. Suddenly, an unusual presence fills the room...

phases.name: vision_deepens
phases.description: The vision becomes more vivid and detailed
phases.prompt_template: The supernatural vision grows stronger and more detailed. What does Pope Leo XIII see and experience?

phases.name: theological_reflection
phases.description: Pope reflects on the theological significance
phases.prompt_template: As the vision subsides, Pope Leo XIII contemplates its meaning through the lens of Catholic theology and doctrine.

phases.name: decision_making
phases.description: Pope decides how to respond to the vision
phases.prompt_template: Having reflected on the vision's significance, Pope Leo XIII must decide what action, if any, to take in response to this supernatural experience.
